solution_line_template: Find the amount Mrs. Sutton's class raised by dividing ${mrs_johnson_raised} by {sutton_johnson_divisor}. ${mrs_johnson_raised}/{sutton_johnson_divisor} = $<<{mrs_johnson_raised}/{sutton_johnson_divisor}={mrs_sutton_raised}>>{mrs_sutton_raised}

Find the amount Miss Rollin's class raised by multiplying ${mrs_sutton_raised} by {rollin_sutton_multiplier}. ${mrs_sutton_raised} x {rollin_sutton_multiplier} = $<<{mrs_sutton_raised}*{rollin_sutton_multiplier}={miss_rollin_raised}>>{miss_rollin_raised}

Multiply ${miss_rollin_raised} by {rollin_total_multiplier} to find the total amount raised. ${miss_rollin_raised} x {rollin_total_multiplier} = $<<{miss_rollin_raised}*{rollin_total_multiplier}={total_raised_before_fees}>>{total_raised_before_fees}

Multiply ${total_raised_before_fees} by {admin_fee_decimal} to find the administration fees. ${total_raised_before_fees} x {admin_fee_decimal} = $<<{total_raised_before_fees}*{admin_fee_decimal}={administration_fees}>>{administration_fees}

Subtract the administration fee from the total amount raised. ${total_raised_before_fees} - ${administration_fees} = $<<{total_raised_before_fees}-{administration_fees}={final_amount_raised}>>{final_amount_raised}
